column5: Download from this site:  https://www.ontario.ca/travel-and-recreation/ontario-fishing-regulations-summary  Regards, Snowball
Thanks! Any changes?  Herring open on Simcoe.

I have a question about the various seasons for the different species. The 3rd or 4th weekends in June are listed as opening day for bass, does that mean it's only catch and release before then or a strict ban on fishing for bass then?

I have a question about the various seasons for the different species. The 3rd or 4th weekends in June are listed as opening day for bass, does that mean it's only catch and release before then or a strict ban on fishing for bass then?  Season is closed, you cannot target bass even if you plan on releasing them.
I picked up a copy at Canadian Tire last week .
I just downloaded it to my phone
New Brook trout limits in the Temagami area 5 fish only one over 11 inches. This affects you Chad.
Edit: MNR site is not updated to 2015 regs...d'oh
Dyslexia is a horrible afflixtion. Your right 12 inches
Thank you for the clarification Bill. Looks like my spring fishing is going to be for trout of some kind :-D

pike and walleye open in may (for most regions).  prior to that, (jan/feb/march/april) you'll be dealing with trout.  just be careful, trout season in MANY locations is not open until "trout opener".  read those regs.
